## Source: ossf-package-analysis (a573def8d25965b25ab7e80b187bc35973c3015d0a23b2c0f8298d800d97a1a2)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'servantcord' @ 1.0.2 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:
- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
